it.unimi.di.law.bubing.test

Class RandomNamedGraphServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimi.di.law.bubing.test.RandomNamedGraphServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NamedGraphServer, FlyweightPrototype<NamedGraphServer>

    public class RandomNamedGraphServer
extends Object
implements NamedGraphServer
    A NamedGraphServer exposing a random graph.

    The graph is generated using the following criteria:

    • the graph has the specified number of sites;
    • each site has the specified depth;
    • all pages are named index.html;
    • the degree of a page is chosen with Gaussian distribution centred around the specified degree;
    • about one tenth of the links are external (i.e., point at another site);
    • of the remaining links, about one fourth point at the parent;
    • in general, one legal page every one hundred returns null.

    The name of a page is http://site/n0/n1/…/index.html, where every component is a non-negative integer.

      RandomNamedGraphServer copy() 
      CharSequence[] successors(CharSequence name)
      If src corresponds to the name of a node in the graph, this method returns an array with the name of its successors (in some order); otherwise, it returns null.
